alert.note: Alert for Macomb (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 7:21PM EDT until June 25 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR MACOMB COUNTY... At 721 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Macomb Township, or near Mount Clemens, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... New Baltimore around 735 PM EDT. Richmond around 740 PM EDT. Memphis around 745 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Roseville, Shelby Township, Ray Center, Utica, Fraser, Eastpointe, Washington, New Haven, Stoney Creek Metro Park and Center Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
